bwwExcerpt: At a distance, this threatened to be too easy a mark, too much of a sentimental sure thing for such theater legends. Surely, one might be forgiven for thinking Vanessa Redgrave and James Earl Jones could have found a tougher, less familiar vehicle than 'Driving Miss Daisy,' Alfred Uhry's 1987 Pulitzer-winning drama and 1989 Oscar-winning movie.
